snippet: The addition of Michael Fein, the founder of an investment firm, comes as Okapi continues to expand and compete against more established rivals in the proxy solicitation industry.
abstract: The addition of Michael Fein, the founder of an investment firm, comes as Okapi continues to expand and compete against more established rivals in the proxy solicitation industry.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Okapi Partners, a Proxy Solicitor, Adds a Senior Executive
